nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_287
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: In his thinking, as in his behavior, he is very traditional.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_288
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Once the teachers agree to accept the new teaching program, they have to face the strain it puts on them.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_289
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: In the long run, it is worthwhile to pursue one's study after graduating from university instead of going to work directly.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_290
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: As the school operates on the Character First principle, moral values and academic achievements are stressed equally.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_291
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: It is said that the meeting, which is scheduled to be held this month, will be put off till next month.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_292
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: The school sees its job as preparing its students for life by cultivating a comprehensive set of principles that can benefit all of them.
